item.title: Why SOUN Stock Is In The Spotlight Today — What Is The Link With CES?
item.description: India-based Ultraviolette Automotive unveiled its new “Violette” voice command interface, developed in partnership with Soundhound AI.

item.title: Why Did LODE Stock Gain In Pre-Market Today?
item.description: Comstock’s unit, Comstock Metals LLC, secured a new facility in California to support its solar panel recycling operations.

item.title: Monero Surges To Record High, Outperforming Bitcoin – Even As Dubai Moves To Ban Privacy Tokens
item.description: Monero’s price hit a new all-time high around $595, and the token’s market capitalization crossed $10 billion over the weekend.

item.title: Jerome Powell’s Speech Is ‘Sound Of The Hammer’ On Fiat Currency, Warn Macro Analysts
item.description: Bitcoin's intraday price pulled back by nearly $2000 after the token reached $90,000 on Monday.

item.title: Why Is Tempus AI Stock Surging 11% Premarket Today?
item.description: Tempus secured data and analytics agreements with more than 70 organizations in 2025, showing the broad adoption of its multimodal data platform.
